snippet: Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo has made no secret of his dislike for Attorney General Eric T. Schneiderman. Now, Mr. Cuomo’s office has begun to solicit the opinions of others in a five-page survey.
abstract: New York Gov Andrew M Cuomo's legal department circulates questionnaire to state agencies soliciting criticism of Atty Gen Eric T Schneiderman, highlighting his antagonistic relationship with state's top lawyer; move is unusual and perhaps unprecedented, and could prefigure attempt on Cuomo's part to divert funding from attorney general's office.
lead_paragraph: Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo has made no secret of his dislike for Attorney General Eric T. Schneiderman. Now, Mr. Cuomo’s office has begun to solicit the opinions of others in a five-page survey.

headline.main: Cuomo’s Team Surveys New York State Agencies for Opinions on Attorney General
headline.print_headline: Cuomo’s Team Surveys State Agencies for Opinions on Attorney General
